TopicTitle: No reentry effects, cooling instead of heating [deadly reentry, FAR and 64k]

Articles.Content:
[http://i.imgur.com/gVyFrq6.png](http://i.imgur.com/gVyFrq6.png)

As seen in that image, regardless of my thermal settings, my capsule cools rather than heats during reentry. Very little slowing occurs as well, until 6-8gs in the lower part of the mid atmosphere. I tried deleting physics and settings.cfg, to no avail. Any ideas? 

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/qid50jqqc8q22c4/output_log.txt?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/qid50jqqc8q22c4/output_log.txt?dl=0)

Thanks!

> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/gVyFrq6.png](http://i.imgur.com/gVyFrq6.png)
> As seen in that image, regardless of my thermal settings, my capsule cools rather than heats during reentry. Very little slowing occurs as well, until 6-8gs in the lower part of the mid atmosphere. I tried deleting physics and settings.cfg, to no avail. Any ideas? 
> 
> [https://www.dropbox.com/s/qid50jqqc8q22c4/output_log.txt?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/qid50jqqc8q22c4/output_log.txt?dl=0)
> 
> Thanks!

I had this issue before. I had created the issue by deleting my physics.cfg. You should not delete those files. To repair them run the steam local content validation or reinstall.
